column1: #Text=Kuvira says : " And you 're the bandits who have been causing chaos where I 'm trying to establish order , are n't you ? "
#Text=Female bandit # 1 says : " We 're sorry , we did n't know this was your train and ... " Kuvira says : " Do n't talk over me ! "
#Text=Male bandit # 1 says : " Please , take mercy on us ! "
#Text=Kuvira says : " Stop groveling as if this is the worst day of your life .
#Text=" Female bandit # 1 says : " We pledge our loyalty to you , Great Uniter .
#Text=" Mako says : " I do n't know why we 're leaving so early if you 're just getting a haircut .
#Text=The dinner at Air Temple Island is n't until later tonight .
#Text=" Wu says : " Because I 'm not just getting a haircut , it 's a spa day !
#Text=" Mako says : " Are you kidding me ?
#Text=What are you having done that takes four hours ?
#Text=" Wu says : " A rejuvenating tea - leaf skin wrap .
#Text=Have you ever gotten one of those , Mako ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Yeah , I 'm ... not interested .
#Text=So while your hands soak in a bubbling milk - bath , your feet are in a tub full of these little sucker - fish that literally eat your calluses away .
#Text=" Wu says : " Then , they scrape your skin with blocks of sea - salt and lube you up with seaweed - infused aloe , wrap you in tea leaves , put you in a hot box for four hours , and bam !
#Text=They must be in town for my coronation .
#Text=" Mako says : " I do n't know if all those people are your fans .
#Text=" Mako says : " Wu , we have to get you out of here !
#Text=" Wu says : " What just happened out there ?
#Text=" Mako says : " I think those were Kuvira 's supporters in the crowd .
#Text=I do n't know what would have happened if you were n't there .
#Text=" Mako says : " You would have been hit by a pie .
#Text=It 's really not that big of a deal .
#Text=" Wu says : " Or I could have been killed !
#Text=I do n't know what I 'd ever do without you !
#Text=I do n't think I can breathe !
#Text=" Mako says : " You 're allergic to bee stings !
#Text=I always get those two mixed up .
